text: nabi addehattinre bharyamaril oraleat oru varttamanam rahasyamayi paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamakunnu.) ennitt a bharya at (marrearale) ariyikkukayum, nabikk allahu at velippetutti keatukkukayum ceytappeal atinre cila bhagam addeham (a bharyaykk‌) ariyiccukeatukkukayum cila bhagam vittukalayukayum ceytu. annane avaleat (a bharyayeat‌) addeham atine parri vivaram ariyiccappeal aval parannu: tankalkk aran i vivaram ariyiccu tannat ? nabi (sa) parannu: sarvvajnanum suksmajnaniyumayittullavanan enikk vivaramariyiccu tannat‌
